trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Wichita Falls
There were no other sightings in Wichita Falls on or around October 15th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsreally bright light moving N to S directly overhead at least 10,000 feet or so,slowed down to nearly stopped changed direction and then changed back. As it went to the south it turned red and then it was gone. Whole thing lasted just a minute if that long. Not long enough to get a camera. Figures. The hair on the back of my neck stoot up and I looked upwards,and there it was. There seems to be alot of activity up there lately.
Summary: bright light moving N to S slight zig-zag turned red and dissapeared
